lead_paragraph: In a case of musical chairs, Fox’s correspondent will take The A.P.’s former front-row seat, and National Public Radio will move up one row to Fox’s old second-row seat.
snippet: In a case of musical chairs, Fox’s correspondent will take The A.P.’s former front-row seat, and National Public Radio will move up one row to Fox’s old second-row seat.

headline.main: Fox News Lands Front-Row Seat at White House
headline.seo: Fox News Gets a Front-Row Seat at the White House
headline.print_headline: Fox News Lands Front-Row Seat At White House
